column1: Kaga-Bandoro is a market town  representing the seat of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Kaga–Bandoro. It acts as the capital of the unrecognized Republic of Dar El Kuti
column4: as the capital of the Nana-Grébizi  prefecture of the Central African Republic
column5: whose capital Bangui is situated 245 km to the south.

column1: Köppen-Geiger climate classification system classifies its climate as tropical wet and dry (Aw).
